item.title: David Lynch’s Hollywood Hills Compound Hits the Market for $15 Million
item.description: David Lynch’s Hollywood Hills compound has hit the market. Its asking price? $15 million. Lynch, who died in January, lived on the 2.5-acre estate for over 35 years, and created “Mulholland Drive” and
